CatDialog.EverytimeLoginTogether: Hey! Let's get on the adventure!
CatDialog.IdleEnemyComing: I can feel great things coming in your way!
CatDialog.IdleChaseIt:
Look! There is something ahead,
let's go and see.
CatDialog.IdlePowerUp: Let's rack up some great combos!
CatDialog.IdleRespinSkill: Did you know I can help you to respin?
CatDialog.IdleUltraHighDamage: Did you know that combo attack gives you more damage?
CatDialog.IdleSilent: Ah, the world is so peaceful...
CatDialog.OpenTreasureLuckyDay: Today is your lucky day! Can you feel it?
CatDialog.ObtainedKey: Let's look for the treasure chest!
CatDialog.EncounteredMonsterSpeechIdentical: I think I met your brother last time.
CatDialog.EncounteredMonsterSpeechIntimidate: Leave!!! Before I smack you down!
CatDialog.EncounteredSkeletonSpeech: Will it break when it walks?
CatDialog.EncounteredTreantSpeech: Looks like the tree got a story to tell.
CatDialog.EncounteredRelicBlockTreasureOnTop: I wonder if there is treasure all the way at the top of the relic...
CatDialog.EncounteredRelicBlockTreasureBehind: Is there a huge treasure behind this relic?

I've been waiting for you!
